name: Suprapong (itch)
description:
Suprapong is a local Pong multiplayer game (might be played online if you use Parsec).

- Play in circular arenas with up to 6 players

- Play with the keyboard or gamepad

- Use your powers to surprise your opponents

- Try the different game modes : Bomb to let the ball explode after a short time, scoring twice on a player side, chaos if you don't fear teleporting balls and other surprises, etc

- Change the options at will (size of the arena, player, ball, game speed, number of balls etc) and create the game you want to face your friends and show them what you're made of !

Join the official discord to find people to play with, ask question, report bugs...
https://discord.gg/QJmZ44v
